name: ghosh-ayush.github.io
description: AI Product Leader portfolio built with React and Vite.

scripts.build: vite build && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -R assets/images dist/assets/ && cp -R documents dist/ && cp portfolio-data.json dist/portfolio-data.json && cp robots.txt dist/robots.txt && cp sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml

author: Ayush Ghosh
